scripts.pkg:prepare: npm run pkg:build && npm run pkg:pack && npm run pkg:move
scripts.clean-install: rm -rf node_modules && npm install cloudinary-url-gen.tgz && npm install
scripts.prepare:import: npm run copy:import && npm run pkg:prepare && npm run clean-install
scripts.prepare:require: npm run copy:require && npm run clean-install
scripts.test: npm run test:import && npm run test:require && npm run copy:import
